name: leadsquared-automation-assignment
description: Playwright TypeScript E2E Testing Assignment for LeadSquared

scripts.test: npx playwright test --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.test:headed: npx playwright test --headed --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.test:login: npx playwright test tests/login.spec.ts --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.test:operations: npx playwright test tests/user-operations.spec.ts --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.test:search: npx playwright test tests/search-filter.spec.ts --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.test:all-with-report: npx playwright test --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir /s /q test-results screenshots playwright-report 2>nul || echo Clean completed
scripts.test:complete: npm run clean && npx playwright test --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.test:pass-all: npx playwright test --workers=1 --retries=0 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324
scripts.kill:port: npx kill-port 9323 9324 || echo No processes to kill
scripts.test:clean-run: npm run kill:port && npm run clean && npx playwright test --workers=1 && npx playwright show-report --port=9324

author: Priyanka
